tk_dbobj_ls

void tk_dbobj_ls ( &$this, $table, $id, [$link_current = false] )

Event handler or widget: Show path and subdirectories. 
We should use admin_panel::open_widget here.
Function Parameters:
- object $this: application
- string $table: Table name.
- string $id: Primary key of root node.
